txt.en: Anár III rises from his tomb!

'You say some of the dwarf-lords rose from their graves and attacked? That must have been a terrifying experience! I'm glad you were able to hold your own against them!\n\n'I had little idea that research could be so dangerous! Is it always?'
Akhaldarâg is in the south-west side of the Pit of Stonejaws.\n\nKyrstig asked you to investigate some of the tombs of dwarf-lords in the name of Longbeard scholarship.
Kyrstig has asked you to investigate tombs she believes belong to note-worthy dwarves in Akhaldarâg.

'Akhaldarâg is smaller than the main mausoleum of the Houses of Rest, but I believe it still contains the tombs of some note-worthy dwarves. I think it would be beneficial for us to investigate who is interred here, for the sake of our Longbeard scholars if not for our own!'
This is the tomb of Althóf the Wise
This is the tomb of Lóni II
Brúni Trollbane rises from his tomb!
Nyráth Toothcrown rises from his tomb!
This is the tomb of Thekki Stonefist
